posts.name: Pete Walters
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.83 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Just in time for autumn, the new “Leafless Tree” emoji (along with the other six new emoji in Unicode 16.0) are now supported in emoji reactions.

In addition, with this release we’re continuing our TestFlight-exclusive testing of Backups. See the beta release post for 7.79 for more details.

Please continue to report any issues you encounter! We’ve added a new beta-only notification if your device runs into certain validation errors, so let us know if you see that.

When reporting issues, please include debug logs and screenshots if applicable; if you’re experiencing a crash, please also include .ips files. Instructions can be found here.

Thank you all, as always, for helping us improve Signal!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.79 release

posts.cooked: Previous beta: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.82 release - #5 by updates-bot

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.82 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.83.0.1111-beta

64 new commits since 7.82.0.1105-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.83 [1]

  • Remove unused property [2]

  • Use non-UInt32 in attachment en-/decryption [3]

  • Add & use AttachmentKey [4]

  • Consider startOffset in Data subscripts [5]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.59.2 [6]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.85.0 [7]

  • Fix empty group member sheet in prod builds. [8]

  • Use shared large primary and secondary button styles in username education view. [9]

  • Fix text being clipped in "Choose restore method" screen. [10]

  • OWSTableSheetViewController refactoring. […] [11]

  • Gate Backup Settings using a remote config [12]

  • Add pending animations to poll voting [13]

  • Remove indirection layer for attachment limits [14]

  • Swiftify group avatar encoding and validation [15]

  • Convert ImageMetadata to a struct [16]

  • Represent ImageFormat.unknown as nil [17]

  • Better UI for No Votes [18]

  • Move mimeType & fileExtension to ImageFormat [19]

  • Simplify ImageFormat [20]

  • Require ImageFormat.isValid(mimeType:)’s parameter [21]

  • Early exit list media [22]

  • Update donation screens for iOS 26. […] [23]

  • Use headline font instead of body.semibold(). [24]

  • Notification for poll doesn't know which thread to open [25]

  • Don't do integrity checks on first list-media after rotating uploadEra [26]

  • Move conditional body inside conditional branch [27]

  • Handle missing CDN info better in the SVR​ restore path [28]

  • Represent invalid ImageMetadata as nil [29]

  • Remove unused mimeType code [30]

  • Remove ows_hasValidGifSize [31]

  • Remove unused cropping code [32]

  • Add DataImageSource [33]

  • Remove OWSImageSource.hasAlpha(…) [34]

  • Make DataImageSource’s readData method consistent [35]

  • Clean up “is animated png” check [36]

  • Rename size limit parameter to clarify behavior [37]

  • Polls + backups [38]

  • Don't prevent media tier downloads due to message request state [39]

  • Be more specific about 'SkipDownloadError'; handle cases in backup download queue runner [40]

  • Poll create options editing cleanup [41]

  • Convert some sheets to HeroSheetViewController [42]

  • First round of polls liquid glass [43]

  • Update message context menu for iOS 26 [44]

  • Add a bunch of attachment happy path logging [45]

  • Fix photo access banner flashing when opening attachment keyboard [46]

  • End poll notification needs threadId [47]

  • Polls UI Polish [48]

  • Refocus last poll option row on delete [49]

  • Fix width on iPad forward contact picker [50]

  • Handle spaces in poll create better [51]

  • Android and desktop don't ignore message body for polls [52]

  • Polls to internal [53]

  • Self info message on end poll [54]

  • Don't treat scheduled uploads we discover on CDN as errors [55]

  • Fix shrunken Cancel button in qr code device transfer screen. […] [56]

  • Log response codes for CDN errors [57]

  • Liquid Glass interactive sheets [58]

  • Update release notes [59]

  • Update translations [60]

  • Revert "Relax Xcode version checks in GitHub Actions" [61]

  • Revert "Use Xcode 26.0.1" [62]

  • Revert "Fix Xcode 26 builds on CI" [63]

  • Revert "Switch to Xcode 26.0" [64]

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.

I got a spam group invite, so I decided to report and block the person. Signal then asked me to report this debug log

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.83.0/d843ba972728aafbe25f8524197167ed9e0d8ffc9ceb771f334477b6024aba5c.zip

For past couple of releases, sending media in general has become a real PITA. Sending either just a single photo, gif take a lot of time (over two minutes at times). At first, when this started, it used to happen on random. Now, it happens more often than I like.

Debug log: https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.83.0/fd0d20caa7ecaa13ceb248aa125bbd10ff5321d1f4c99773de82f4bd9dd54422.zip

First, I sent a photo and then a gif after, separately. Both took around a minute and a half just to send.

posts.name: link ✦
posts.cooked:
have been having typing indicators not show up (even though they’re enabled on both sides) for the last 24h or so. they seem to come back sometimes, then not work again seems like it might be a server side issue

at the same time, messages, media, and read receipts etc. all work as usual

(although also having media send issues like above)

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.83.0/1b316fb6e64f194bd331c2758365197719de1dabb8ea11c90dc5f69f153cd81e.zip

posts.name: Delamcode
posts.cooked: I’d like to let y’all know that center stage hasn’t been working since iOS 26 btw. I assume this is an API/xcode issue so I’m posting this here instead of opening a GitHub issue.

posts.name: Nikos
posts.cooked: Any fix for not showing profile pic in certain groups please?

I’m really hoping this PR will be reviewed and merged. This issue is one of the longest pain on Signal for iOS.

github.com/signalapp/Signal-iOS

Improve handling of large video file attachments

main ← ianrahman:video-quality
opened 12:21AM - 28 Oct 25 UTC
ianrahman
+215 -48

### First time contributor checklist - [X] I have read the [README](https://git…hub.com/signalapp/Signal-iOS/blob/main/README.md) and [CONTRIBUTING](https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-iOS/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) documents - [X] I have signed the [Contributor Licence Agreement](https://signal.org/cla/) ### Contributor checklist - [x] My commits are rebased on the latest main branch - [x] My commits are in nice logical chunks - [x] My contribution is fully baked and is ready to be merged as is - [X] I have tested my contribution on these devices: * iPhone 16 Pro Max, iOS 26.1 b4 - - - - - - - - - - Addresses #4370 ### Description - retry AVAsset exports across presets and map `AVError.maximumFileSizeReached` to `.fileSizeTooLarge` - enforce preset dimension limits based on bitrate estimates and annotate the heuristics we rely on - add shared helpers for export error detection and size/quality guardrails - made media file size limits consistent and removed hardcoded calculations for static values #### Testing - Attached a large (> 100 MB) video file to a message and successfully sent to a non-dev device. Received video size was < 100 MB and video quality was significantly better than same video attached and sent with current production implementation.

link_counts.title: Improve handling of large video file attachments by ianrahman · Pull Request #6136 · signalapp/Signal-iOS · GitHub

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.84 release.
